p: Euphorbia hirta Linn. (E. hirta) is a common herb that belongs to Euphorbia genus of Euphorbiaceae family. Euphorbia hirta L. is found in pan-tropic, partly sub-tropic areas and worldwide including Australia, Western Australia, Northern Australia, Queensland, New south wales, Central America, Africa, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, China and India [ 158]. In Vietnam, Euphorbia hirta L. is commonly distributed in many provinces of the southern area ( Figure 17). Euphorbia hirta L. was used as a traditional medicine in the treatment of diabetes for a long time ago [ 158, 159, 160, 161].
